Paccayacatukkaṃ

children: . Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ
dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo
ca abyākato sappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: 1. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo ca abyākato sappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi.

children: Abyākataṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā. (1)

Kusalaṃ sappaccayañca abyākataṃ sappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
Akusalaṃ sappaccayañca abyākataṃ sappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

children: . Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)

children: . Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: . Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava…pe… novigate pañca (saṃkhittaṃ).

children: Hetupaccayā
naārammaṇe pañca (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Sahajātavārampi…pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
Hetu-ārammaṇapaccayā

children: . Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa
hetupaccayena paccayo… tīṇi.

children: . Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo… tīṇi.

children: . Hetuyā
satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta…pe… sahajāte nava…pe… upanissaye nava…pe… avigate terasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 8. Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta…pe… sahajāte nava…pe… upanissaye nava…pe… avigate terasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetuyā pannarasa, naārammaṇe pannarasa (saṃkhittaṃ).
Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta (saṃkhittaṃ).
Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

Hetupaccayo

children: . Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo lokuttaro dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
innerText: 37. Kusalaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
Abyākataṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 38. Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ).
Naadhipatiyā dve (saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi…pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ).
Hetuārammaṇapaccayādi

children: . Kusalo lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
innerText: 39. Kusalo lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (2)

children: Kusalo
lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
innerText: Kusalo lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo kusalassa lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
Kusalo lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
Abyākato lokuttaro dhammo abyākatassa lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā
dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 40. Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte dve, aññamaññe dve, nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri…pe… avigate dve (saṃkhittaṃ).
(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
1-13. Kusalattika-kenaciviññeyyadukaṃ
1-7. Paṭiccavārādi
Paccayacatukkaṃ

children: . Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo ca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
innerText: 41. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo ca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)

children: Akusalaṃ
kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi.
innerText: Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… tīṇi.
Abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyañca abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

children: Akusalaṃ
kenaci viññeyyañca abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
innerText: Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyañca abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)

children: . Kusalaṃ
kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
innerText: 42. Kusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
Abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
innerText: 43. Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe… avigate nava (saṃkhittaṃ).
Paccanīyaṃ
Nahetupaccayo

children: . Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
innerText: 44. Akusalaṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)

children: Abyākataṃ
kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
innerText: Abyākataṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava…pe… novigate pañca (saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi…pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ).
innerText: 45. Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava…pe… novigate pañca (saṃkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārampi…pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ).
Hetupaccayo

children: . Kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo kusalassa kenaci viññeyyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo… tīṇi.
innerText: 46. Kusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo kusalassa kenaci viññeyyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo… tīṇi.
Akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo akusalassa kenaci viññeyyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo… tīṇi.
Abyākato kenaci viññeyyo dhammo abyākatassa kenaci viññeyyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)

children: . Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava…pe… avigate terasa (saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ).
innerText: 47. Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava…pe… avigate terasa (saṃkhittaṃ. Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṃ, evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ).

children: . Kusalaṃ
nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (kenaciviññeyyasadisaṃ).
innerText: 48. Kusalaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (kenaciviññeyyasadisaṃ).
Kusalattikacūḷantaradukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
